Configuration.Name: L1=L2=20m_Lens_apx12p5_srce30_VS
Configuration.SetupScript: sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/setspeed 17449') sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength 8.1') config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 19250 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 30 config.guide = 'lens' config.apx = -98 config.bs = 5 config.beamcenterx = 89.4092 config.beamcenterz = 92.5865 config.drive()
